languages.text: {n}Беженцы с Кьявы Гамма смотрят на вас, кто — хмуро и настороженно, а кто — с нескрываемой благодарностью.{/n}
{n}The refugees from Kiava Gamma are looking at you, some with apprehensive frowns, some with unconcealed gratitude.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Беженцы с Кьявы Гамма смотрят на вас, кто — хмуро и настороженно, а кто — с нескрываемой благодарностью.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The refugees from Kiava Gamma are looking at you, some apprehensively, with a frown, and some with unconcealed gratitude.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_RefugeeForgeWorld

traits.locale_text: {n}The refugees from Kiava Gamma are looking at you, some with apprehensive frowns, some with unconcealed gratitude.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_RefugeeForgeWorld

languages.text: {n}キアヴァ・ガンマの難民たちが、ある者は不安げに、またある者は抑えきれない感謝の気持ちをもって、こちらを見つめている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The refugees from Kiava Gamma are looking at you, some with apprehensive frowns, some with unconcealed gratitude.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}キアヴァ・ガンマの難民たちが、ある者は不安げに、またある者は抑えきれない感謝の気持ちをもって、こちらを見つめている。{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_RefugeeForgeWorld

languages.text: {n}从基亚瓦伽马星逃出来的难民们看着你。有些人忧虑地皱着眉头，还有的人脸上带着毫不掩饰的感激。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The refugees from Kiava Gamma are looking at you, some with apprehensive frowns, some with unconcealed gratitude.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}从基亚瓦伽马星逃出来的难民们看着你。有些人忧虑地皱着眉头，还有的人脸上带着毫不掩饰的感激。{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_RefugeeForgeWorld

languages.text: {n}Los refugiados de Kiava Gamma te miran; algunos con el ceño fruncido y otros con una gratitud más que evidente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The refugees from Kiava Gamma are looking at you, some with apprehensive frowns, some with unconcealed gratitude.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los refugiados de Kiava Gamma te miran; algunos con el ceño fruncido y otros con una gratitud más que evidente.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_RefugeeForgeWorld

languages.text: {n}Les réfugiés de Kiava Gamma vous regardent, certains avec appréhension, en fronçant les sourcils, et d'autres avec une reconnaissance évidente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The refugees from Kiava Gamma are looking at you, some with apprehensive frowns, some with unconcealed gratitude.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les réfugiés de Kiava Gamma vous regardent, certains avec appréhension, en fronçant les sourcils, et d'autres avec une reconnaissance évidente.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_RefugeeForgeWorld

languages.text: {n}Die Flüchtlinge von Kiava Gamma sehen dich an, einige missmutig und zweifelnd, andere offen dankbar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The refugees from Kiava Gamma are looking at you, some with apprehensive frowns, some with unconcealed gratitude.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Flüchtlinge von Kiava Gamma sehen dich an, einige missmutig und zweifelnd, andere offen dankbar.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_RefugeeForgeWorld

languages.text: {n}Kiava Gama sığınmacıları; bazıları endişeyle kaşlarını çatmış, bazılarıysa bariz bir minnettarlıkla olmak üzere sana bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The refugees from Kiava Gamma are looking at you, some with apprehensive frowns, some with unconcealed gratitude.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kiava Gama sığınmacıları; bazıları endişeli bir şekilde kaşlarını çatmış hâlde, bazılarıysa bariz bir minnettarlıkla sana bakıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_RefugeeForgeWorld
